text: @ABC #playingtrumpasafool Now that COVID-19 has made it's way into Trump's home, he is in a full panic mode. He will move heaven and earth to make sure he doesn't get it. He has a new rsspect for how most everyone else feels! Probably too late. He will likely get it! Karma time! https://t.co/XTe9tT9jpK
